::DarkMouse::

She cringed as she saw the gun against her head. "I don't know where 
Megatron is. In...Inn..Inferno had just told me that Megarton was 
killed when you and that other bot charged us. That's all I know." 
her voice trembling as she spoke.  She then cried out, her voice 
echoing through the halls. "I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING! PLEASE!" she then 
transformed into bot mode and looked at Starscream. "Please believe 
me. I don't know anything. Megatron wanted me dead.  I left his group 
and ran away. Please, don't kill me."  she said, cringing against the 
wall, looking into Starscreams optics with a terrified look on her 
face.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (It's okay Kingler, Starscream is looking after it.)
>

>

>

Megatron 
> we killed is a clone! No you will tell us where he is, or your days 
> are over!"
> 
> Starscream pulled out his gun an put it against the bot's head.
